humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the tumor size as 3.5 x 3.5 X 3.5 cm. According to the rules, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. This tumor size falls within the T2 category, so the pathologic T stage is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the tumor size is given as 3.5 x 3.5 X 3.5 cm. According to the TNM staging system, a T2 stage is given to tumors that are greater than 2 cm but not greater than 5 cm in size. Therefore, the predicted T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
